name: Super Saiyan Fighter
description:
Storyline:
After the last war, the heroes from the Dragon Ball world gathered together. They must hurry up and practice because new enemies are coming from the universe soon!

Features:
Tapping Feature—a simple action that brings endless fun, just tap the screen with your finger. You can destroy a steady stream of enemies non-stop!

Idle Function:
Not enough time to devote to video games? Feeling lazy and don't want to think too much? This game is for you, your heroes will automatically battle and upgrade even while you're away.

Hero Evolution:
Upgrade heroes to unlock different skins, as well as beautiful costumes for you to match.

Countless Characters:
Open the hero book, choose the characters you like, and recruit them. Participate in online activities and get SSSR heroes for free.

Free Daily Bonus:
Get amazing AFK-offline bonuses every single day, to make sure there will be no shortage of resources.

Frightening Boss:
Challenge the instance Boss, use your wisdom and combat power to defeat him. Adjust your formation and match powerful skills, you can win without spending a dime!

Competitive Gameplay:
Challenge yourself in Cross-server Battles and Guild Arena. Compete with players from all over the world and prove to them that you're the strongest fighter!

Play Super Saiyan Fighter now, explore the magical world of Dragon Ball and experience the fun of fighting!
